Comment: He is perhaps finally starting to realise that he is completely out of his depth and has fucked it all up. China will not talk to him until he lifts all the tariffs and even then it will demand free trade.  He cannot bullshit his way out of this one and has nowhere to run and hide. It is not as if he can declare bankruptcy and stiff his creditors as he has done so many times before.  Trump has discredited the US to the point where the USD and bonds are no longer safe havens. His insane rhetoric and arsehole policies have made international investors throw up their hands in horror.  The US has become a no go zone for tourists, business travel and conventions. Scientists and others are being fired or defunded and leaving for friendlier environments. US citizens are receiving messages from their government to self deport and he is refusing to repatriate a US edit: resident deported to El Salvador.  He has tipped the US into recession and without a strong currency and bond market it will not be able to pull itself out of it as quickly as it has before and this could lead to an economic depression.
